content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Dear Hassan,

Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am pleased to hear that you are interested in renting it.

As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains from the rental. I am open to discussing a rental price that works for both of us. Can you provide me with an offer that you would be comfortable with?

Please keep in mind that the apartment is only 25 square meters, so the rental price should reflect that. I am open to discussing different options, but ultimately, I need to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment.

Thank you again for considering my apartment. I look forward to hearing your offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 300 Euro per month.

Thank you again for your time and consideration.

It was great to meet you.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Dear Hassan,

Thank you for your offer of 300 Euro per month for the rental of the apartment. I appreciate your interest and willingness to negotiate.

However, I must respectfully decline your offer. While I understand that the apartment is only 25 square meters, I believe that a rental price of 300 Euro per month is not reasonable for the size of the apartment.

I am willing to discuss different options with you, but ultimately, I need to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. I appreciate your understanding and willingness to work with me.

Thank you again for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you please tell me your counterproposal?

Thank you.

It was great to meet you.

I appreciate your time.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Dear Hassan,

Thank you for your understanding and willingness to work with me. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I am open to discussing different options with you.

Based on our discussion, I would like to propose a rental price of 400 Euro per month for the apartment. This price reflects the size of the apartment and the current market rates in the area.

I understand that this may be higher than you were expecting, but I believe that it is a fair and reasonable price for the apartment. I am willing to discuss additional terms and conditions with you, such as the length of the rental agreement and any additional fees or charges.

Thank you again for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
